media:group.media:title: How Our Brains Learn Consciousness
media:group.media:description:
Start building your ideal daily routine with Fabulous. The first 100 people who click on the link will get 25% OFF Fabulous Premium: https://thefab.co/scishowpsych4

Neuroscience is abound with debates over the nature of consciousness. Which makes sense, because itâ€™s a very abstract idea. We know we are conscious, but theories of why, how and what brain activity causes it are still simply that: theories. 

Hosted by: Anthony Brown
